name: Asylum Call
description:
A puzzle FPS light horror game which talks to you through the phone (yes, you need a companion app along with the PC game).

Get out of the old asylum where the crazy psychiatrist plays with you like cat with a mouse.

Troubleshooting:

* The PC where the game is running needs to be connected to the same local network as the smartphone.

* In case the app does not automatically connect when the new game is started, try to allow it in firewall.
